alert.note: Alert for North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 25 at 8:17PM PST until December 26 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT NEAR BEACHES AND HEADLANDS... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts as high as 50 to 60 mph near beaches and headlands. * WHERE...In Oregon, North Oregon Coast. In Washington, South Washington Coast. * WHEN...Until midnight PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could result in tree damage and scattered power outages. Travel may be difficult at times, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
